author: kou
msg: Merge r21793 from trunk into the 1.4.x branch.
Ruby: Accept nil for Svn::Repos#load_fs's parent_dir argument.

author: kou
msg: The fourth argument of svn_repos_load_fs2(), parent_dir, accepts NULL.

author: philip
msg: Fix a crash that occurred when opening a working copy was interrupted.
(do_open): On error reset lock->set since it becomes a dangling pointer,
although nothing should ever use it since the baton is closed.
